column2:
"That's it... I've found it...!
The memory I thought lost to darkness is in my grasp...!"

"My mission... The duty with which I was entrusted...
I know now what I must do..."
"I have to repay my debt to her..."

"Hmph... Serves them right.
Did they really think we would allow them to endanger the event everyone has been anticipating?"

"Why are you looking at me like that?
You think you're seeing my kind, gentle side after all...? Heheheh... You need to get your eyes checked."
